task: Analyze this entire project directory and generate a detailed report covering the following:

sections.title: File and Folder Structure
instructions: List all top-level folders and their purpose (e.g., src/components, public/).
Identify key files (e.g., package.json, tailwind.config.ts, tsconfig.json).

sections.title: Dependencies
instructions: Enumerate all dependencies and devDependencies from package.json.
Highlight anything outdated, deprecated, or suspicious.

sections.title: Core Functionality
instructions: Summarize what the application does (e.g., quiz logic, Firebase usage, score visualization).
Identify which files contain scoring logic, quiz state, and result interpretation.

sections.title: Dynamic vs Static Logic
instructions: Determine if the quiz questions are hardcoded or dynamically loaded (e.g., from JSON, Firebase, or external source).

sections.title: Areas Requiring Attention
instructions: Find any unimplemented TODOs, placeholders, or commented-out sections.
Check for gaps in error handling, responsive design, or accessibility features.

sections.title: Build & Execution
instructions: Validate all npm scripts in package.json (dev, build, start, lint).
Confirm compatibility with Node 18 and Next.js 15.

sections.title: Potential Issues
instructions: Check for missing environment files like .env.local.
Detect runtime dependency misconfigurations or inconsistencies.
Check for unused packages or inconsistent import paths.
